scripts.android:build: cd apps/client && npx cap build android
scripts.android:run: cd apps/client && npx cap run android
scripts.android:clean: cd apps/client && npx cap clean android
scripts.android:sync: cd apps/client && npx cap sync android
scripts.android:open: cd apps/client && npx cap open android
scripts.ios:build: cd apps/client && npx cap build ios
scripts.ios:run: cd apps/client && npx cap run ios
scripts.ios:clean: cd apps/client && npx cap clean ios
scripts.ios:sync: cd apps/client && npx cap sync ios
scripts.ios:open: cd apps/client && npx cap open ios
scripts.setup: pnpm install && pnpm db:push && cd packages/db && npx prisma generate
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf ./node_modules ./.turbo ./.cache ./dist ./build pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm install && pnpm db:push && npx prisma generate
scripts.dev: concurrently "turbo watch dev --continue" "cd apps/client && pnpm cap:dev:android" "cd apps/client && pnpm cap:dev:ios"
scripts.dev:mobile: concurrently "turbo watch dev -F @reservatior/nextjs --continue" "cd apps/client && pnpm cap:dev:android" "cd apps/client && pnpm cap:dev:ios"
